source: TEXT_SUBFST121_00060_SEQ_00<tab>Tierney believes you are ready to join a guildhest.
target: TEXT_SUBFST121_00060_SEQ_00<tab>ベントブランチ牧場のティルニーは冒険者にギルドオーダーを紹介したいようだ。

source: TEXT_SUBFST121_00060_SEQ_01<tab>Guildhests are special operations organized by Adventurers' Guilds and overseen by battlewardens. To learn more about what guildhests entail, speak with Battlewarden Ribald.
target: TEXT_SUBFST121_00060_SEQ_01<tab>ティルニーにギルドオーダーを紹介された。ベントブランチ牧場の「特務隊長リバルド」に話をきいてみよう。

source: TEXT_SUBFST121_00060_SEQ_02<tab>Battlewarden Ribald explains that guildhests will test your ability to work with others to achieve a common goal. Unless you are content to conduct your adventures forever alone, it may be in your best interests to participate in these operations at least once.
target: TEXT_SUBFST121_00060_SEQ_02<tab>特務隊長リバルドからギルドオーダーの説明を受けた。興味があるなら、彼から仕事を引き受けよう。

source: TEXT_SUBFST121_00060_TIERNEY_000_01<tab>Should you be interested in a challenge quite unlike your average levequest, you might consider joining a guildhest.
target:
TEXT_SUBFST121_00060_TIERNEY_000_01ギルドリーヴをこなせるあなたなら、
「ギルドオーダー」も依頼できそうですね。

source: TEXT_SUBFST121_00060_TIERNEY_000_02<tab>If you wish to know more, pray speak with Battlewarden Ribald outside yonder tent. I will inform him of your success against the anoles so that there are no doubts as to your abilities.
target:
TEXT_SUBFST121_00060_TIERNEY_000_02興味があるなら、あちらのテントにいる
「特務隊長リバルド」に話してみてください。
あなたの冒険者としての実力は私が保証します。

source: TEXT_SUBFST121_00060_RIBALD_000_01<tab>I was told a stalwart adventurer would be along shortly. I take it that is you? Then permit me to tell you all about our current operations.
target:
TEXT_SUBFST121_00060_RIBALD_000_01ティルニーから聞いているぞ。
「ギルドオーダー」の任務を任せられる実力者だとな。
では早速、「ギルドオーダー」の説明をしよう。

source: TEXT_SUBFST121_00060_RIBALD_000_02<tab>Wait... Might this be your first time participating in a guildhest? I remember my first hest. It was the night of my twentieth nameday. My fellow guildmates invited me to join them in the slaying of a family of peistes who were stealing chocobo eggs from Bentbranch Meadows.
target:
TEXT_SUBFST121_00060_RIBALD_000_02こいつは、ギルドリーヴとはまた違った特殊な任務だ。
ひとりでは達成できないのが、
大きな特徴だな。

source: TEXT_SUBFST121_00060_RIBALD_000_03<tab>The moment we arrived, one of the terrible beasts immediately turned to me and charged. The thing was thrice my size and had already maimed several chocobokeeps.
target:
TEXT_SUBFST121_00060_RIBALD_000_03周辺住民や各組織から請け負う依頼のなかでも、
特に難しい任務ばかりだからな……。
お前たちの結束力が試されるだろう。

source: TEXT_SUBFST121_00060_RIBALD_000_04<tab>There was no way I could win, so I simply froze and waited for the end. But that's when I remembered that I was not alone. My friends rallied around me, and together we defeated the peistes! That, my friend, is what a guildhest is truly about.
target:
TEXT_SUBFST121_00060_RIBALD_000_04もちろん、任務を達成すれば相応の報酬を与えよう。
初めて任務をこなしたときは、多少は報酬に
色をつけてやる。せいぜい気張るんだな。

source: TEXT_SUBFST121_00060_RIBALD_000_05<tab>What say you, friend? Care to experience a hest for yourself?
target: TEXT_SUBFST121_00060_RIBALD_000_05<tab>任務を受けたい時は私に声をかけてくれ。
